meanings.sent1: The compressional force squeezed the box smaller.
meanings.sent2: The compressional waves traveled through the material quickly.
meanings.sent3: The compressional pillow made him feel like a sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her compressional hug made him feel safe and secure.
meanings.sent5: The compressional grip of the vice made it impossible to open.

meanings.definition: The act or process of compressing.
meanings.sent1: The compressional of the spring made it bounce back.
meanings.sent2: The compressional of the data reduced the file size.
meanings.sent3: The compressional of the accordion made cheerful music.
meanings.sent4: The compressional of time in the dream felt surreal.
meanings.sent5: The compressional of the crowd in the stadium was overwhelming.
